Title: Relates to the definition of the practice of pharmacy; repealer
Summary: Relates to the definition of the practice of pharmacy; provides that the state board of pharmacy shall not adopt any rules authorizing a pharmacist to prescribe a controlled drug; repeals provisions related to the collaborative drug therapy management demonstration program.
LawCode: Amd ยง6801, rpld ยง6801-a, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the definition of the practice of pharmacy; and to repeal section 6801-a of the education law, relating to the collaborative drug therapy management demonstration program
